pull.title: More details for getblock and gettransaction
pull.body:
Add block "confirmations" to getblock, mainly for identifying orphans

---

Second parameter to JSON-RPC getblock/gettransaction: decompositions

This is an Object specifying how to decompose specific elements.
Currently supported:
- "tx": "no", "hash", "hex", "obj"
- "script": "no", "hex", "asm", "obj"

---

Note that this depends on pulls #841 (sipa/getalltransactions) and #885 (luke-jr/getblock_cleanup), so the diff includes those until they are merged.

events.body: Can you use enums instead of numbers to identify the several decompositions?

events.message: Add block "confirmations" to getblock, mainly for identifying orphans

Second parameter to JSON-RPC getblock/gettransaction: decompositions

This is an Object specifying how to decompose specific elements.
Currently supported:
- "tx": "no", "hash", "hex", "obj"
- "script": "no", "hex", "asm"

events.body: Decodes of BIP16 transactions scriptsig are not useful and this needs some docs. (I wasted a fair bit trying to figure out why "{'script':'hex'}" wouldn't work, for lack of an example. No reason not to pull though.
